title: State of the Season: Preseason Progress

replies.body: L E A G U E  O F  T H U N D E R L O R D S
its really sad that teams are just picking this for the straight burst... it needs to be nerfed to the fkin ground
I think most people would agree. Why is ur post being downdooted?

Because youll find that its not Thunderlords that needs to be nerfed as much as it is making other keystones more powerful (Exception Warlords, which is actually still decent. (no im being srs)) Even the 300 Health bonus from the tank line of "strength of the ages" is actually a trap. and is barely noticable. However Riot said they wanted gamechanging masteries, and theyre there. Some just need a push!

The state of this season is bloody terrible ever since the 5.24 patch ive been on my usual 25 ping and all i get is "Attempting to reconnect" for the whole game and ive been kicked out of majority of my recent games and its starting to annoy me as every other game doesnt have an issue just league... fix this
If you are having this problem it would be a problem on your end since barely anyone else seems to be having it. Best bet would be port forwarding

I and most the people I play with have this problem, 45 ms constant and then attempting to reconnect for most of the game. It is no secret the Oceania server is basically a 3rd world server. And League is the only game we have troubles with too.
ive asked people in majority of my games and they said they have been having the same problem so its not just on my end...
it's the NBN man. it's been **** for me too.
Yea dw i worked out how to fix it all goods
Now jinx{{champion:222}}  is non-existent cause she is terrible with these changes. QQ

I beg to differ, ive actaully picked her up in this current meta, and she is amazing!!! Go BF Zeal, finish IE and pick up PD. Depending on enemy team comp, grab a Mercurial and mehbe even a BT (Games usually done for me at this point tho) She is still a very viable champion however, and due to her AS stacking Q, her lvl 1 can be very potent
One thing you definitely need to do in s6 is give {{champion:121}} a skin or two, he only has two right now. And maybe nerf rengar a  bit

Marksmen:
"There have been some balance outliers we need to adjust. (Kog'Maw, Quinn, MF, etc etc)

Wouldn't it just have been quicker to list the marksman that DIDIN'T need balance changes?
just make a new game riot like a triple a game the lore is there the map is there just MAKE IT HAPPEN RIOT. were still waiting {{summoner:13}}
*Tencent not rito

Everything above looks pretty solid. I think that vision needs to be more appealing as well as dragons, so those changes are great but thunderlords & essence reaver are still too strong compared to other items/keystones as they dominate every game.
I reckon Yellow Trinket Cool down needs to come back down!

Wards are my problem! 

As a support, normally I buy a ward item and take the sweeping lens + upgrade for counter-vision. 

So when it comes to team fights and we are grouped for an extended period of time, my 3 wards have dropped and I have to back to gain vision... which makes being a support fairly pointless. Meanwhile, my adc can still drop wards cause theirs is still regenerating every 120 seconds. 

Wish ward items held more charges and/or regenerated like trinkets do, would make supporting roles more substantial.
N E R F D A R I U S
i like ahri cuz she is my waifu

when does season start
Hello, when S6 season start in Oce and also the new rank model thanks
BRING BACK PURCHASABLE VISION WARDS. OH YOU WANT TO WARD... TO BAD YOU CAN ONLY PLACE 3 AND YOU GET 1 EVERY 130 SECONDS
Buy vision wards or buy support ward items??? .-.

But you can only buy one, and in lower divs/norms, there is actually not much anti-vision occuring. And not every champion has the space for a sight stone or Support ward item. Especially alot of your hypercarry roles, such as your damage JG's, ADC's, and mid laners. Even top laners dont benefit enough for a sightstone! (Nor  is it worth buying and selling later)
